      • invalidated

        public void invalidated(Observable valueModel)
        Description copied from interface: InvalidationListener
        This method needs to be provided by an implementation of InvalidationListener. It is called if an ObservableValue becomes invalid.

        In general is is considered bad practice to modify the observed value in this method.

        Parameters:
        valueModel - The ObservableValue that became invalid
